objective: Write a Java program that prints: Hello EduCode!
Print the sum of 8 and 12 as a single integer.

Print two lines:
First: Java
Second: EduCode
Declare int a=4 and b=6, print 'a b sum' with spaces (e.g., '4 6 10').
Print result of 9 divided by 4 as a floating point number with one decimal (2.2).
Read a single word from stdin and print its length.
Read two integers and print their product.
Read an integer and print 'Positive', 'Negative' or 'Zero'.
Read an integer (1-3) and print 'One', 'Two', or 'Three'. If outside range print 'Other'.
Read n and print the sum of 1..n.
Read integers until zero and print count of negative numbers.
Read n then n integers; print the maximum value.
Write a method to compute factorial of a non-negative integer and print factorial(n) for input n (n<=12).
Define a class Student with fields name and grade. Read name (single word) and integer grade, print 'name grade'. You may use a class instance.
Read n followed by n words; print each distinct word and its frequency in insertion order (word then count per line).

example.input: 6 a b a c b a

testCases.input: 6 a b a c b a
